thread.title: Resident Evil 7 speedrun is a knife-only Madhouse sprint
thread.title_full: Resident Evil 7 speedrun is a knife-only Madhouse sprint

title: Resident Evil 7 speedrun is a knife-only Madhouse sprint
text:
You could try this at home too, I guess. Shares 
Resident Evil 7 is a very scary videogame set in a creepy old mansion. Typically, it takes players around 10-15 hours to finish the game, but in real life you'd probably not want to linger around a house full of deranged murderers for that long. No, around three hours seems more reasonable, which is what speedrunner Quizzle has done. 
He's playing on the Madhouse difficulty as well, which lacks checkpoints and regenerating health. The final run time is 3:26, with eight restarts and, uh, all Mr Everywheres destroyed. 
Check out the run below. I won't be attempting this anytime soon because I found this game utterly punishing. In a good way, I guess. ABOUT THE AUTHOR Shaun Prescott Shaun is PC Gamerâ€™s Australian Editor. He loves masochistic platformers but lacks the skill and grace to complete them. He has four broken keyboards hidden under his desk, filed between an emergency six-pack of Reschs and five years worth of XXL promotional t-shirts. He stares out the window a lot. Topics
